attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Revoke or amend Section 44 of the Criminal Justice Act, 2003, which enables trials to be undertaken without juries, on the grounds that the integrity of the common law, including the right to trial by jury, should take ultimate precedence over the preventable risk of jury tampering; and, that the precedent set by allowing such trials culd be potentially cited in the future to undermine legal rights of defendants.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
